title: GameStop Earnings Report: Loss Widened Last Quarter
sub_head: Retailer posted modest sales growth amid turnaround efforts
body:
GameStop Corp. widened its loss and posted modest revenue growth last quarter as it continued efforts to revitalize its business under a recently overhauled executive team and board of directors.
The Grapevine, Texas-based retailer on Wednesday reported a loss of $105.4 million in net income for the quarter ended Oct. 30, or $1.39 a share, compared with a loss of $18.8 million a year earlier. Net sales were $1.30 billion, up from $1.01 billion a year earlier.
